1.name: Debit Authorization
1.description: Verify that the Sender is the owner of the Debit Account or is authorized to debit it

2.name: Payment Classification
2.description: Calssify an incoming payment instruction (PI - directs) and an incoming settlement notification (SN - cover payments or credit advices)

3.name: PI/SN Automatic Matching
3.description: Calssify an incoming payment instruction (PI - directs) and an incoming settlement notification (SN - cover payments or credit advices)

4.name: PI/SN Manual Matching
4.description: Calssify an incoming payment instruction (PI - directs) and an incoming settlement notification (SN - cover payments or credit advices)

5.name: Sender Credit Line
5.description: Provide Sender Credit Lines against senders of PI messages, where a cover message (SN)  is to be sent by a third party bank
